TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AddInStore extends System.Object
public ref class AddInStore abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供方法以存储和查找有关可用外接程序及管线段的信息。

span.span: Provides methods to store and find information about available add-ins and pipeline segments.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 按照下表中所述，使用此类生成、重新生成和更新两个缓存文件。Use this class to build, rebuild, and update two cache files, as described in the following table. |缓存文件Cache file|用于创建文件的方法Methods that create the file| |----------------|----------------------------------| |PipelineSegmentsPipelineSegments.store

此文件位于管道目录结构的根目录中。This file is located in the root directory of the pipeline directory structure.|

用新管道段更新文件。Updates the file with new pipeline segments. 如果未安装新段，则此方法只验证缓存。If no new segments are installed, this method just validates the cache.



重新生成文件并包括新的管线段。Rebuilds the file and includes new pipeline segments.| |AddIns。存储AddIns.store

此文件位于包含一个或多个外接程序子目录的目录中。This file is located in a directory that contains one or more add-in subdirectories. 如果此目录位于管道目录结构中，则必须将其命名为 AddIns。If this directory is in the pipeline directory structure, it must be named AddIns.|

使用指定位置的新外接程序更新文件。Updates the file with new add-ins at a specified location. 如果外接程序在管道目录结构之外，则调用此方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure.

如果未安装新的外接程序，则此方法只验证缓存。If no new add-ins are installed, this method just validates the cache.



重新生成文件并在指定位置包含外接程序。Rebuilds the file and includes add-ins at a specified location. 如果外接程序在管道目录结构之外，则调用此方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure.



如果外接程序在管道目录结构中，则此方法将用新的外接程序更新文件。If the add-ins are in the pipeline directory structure, this method updates the file with new add-ins.



如果外接程序在管道目录结构中，此方法将重新生成文件并包括新的外接程序。If the add-ins are in the pipeline directory structure, this method rebuilds the file and includes new add-ins.| 这些方法会创建缓存文件，前提是这些文件以前不存在。These methods create the cache files if they do not previously exist. 创建缓存文件后，使用方法检查文件以查找与外接程序的指定宿主视图匹配的所有外接程序。After the cache files are created, use the method to examine the files to find all add-ins that match a specified host view of the add-in. 你还可以使用方法查找特定外接程序。You can also use the method to find a specific add-in. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不支持允许不受信任的用户或实体访问 PipelineSegments.store 和 Addins.store。It is unsupported to allow untrusted users or entities to access PipelineSegments.store and Addins.store. 这样做可能会导致应用程序出现数据损坏问题。Doing so can cause data corruption issues for applications. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更新缓存文件。The following example shows how to update cache files. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#2)]

span.span: Add-Ins and Extensibility

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> FindAddIn (Type hostViewOfAddIn, string pipelineRootFolderPath, string addInFilePath, string addInTypeName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> FindAddIn(class System.Type hostViewOfAddIn, string pipelineRootFolderPath, string addInFilePath, string addInTypeName) cil managed

static member FindAddIn : Type * string * string * string -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>

param.name: hostViewOfAddIn

span.span: The type name of the add-in.
Finds a specific add-in.

returns.span: 标记的集合，仅包含表示已找到的外接程序的标记。

span.span: A collection of tokens that contains only the token representing the add-in that was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找到外接程序的单个管道，它将是集合中的唯一项。If a single pipeline for an add-in is found, it will be the only item in the collection. 如果找到了指定外接程序的多个管道，可以通过检查属性来区分它们。If multiple pipelines to the specified add-in are found, you can differentiate them by examining the property. ## Examples 下面的示例查找特定外接程序。The following example finds a specific add-in. param.span: 用于定义外接程序宿主视图的类型。

param.span: 枚举值之一。

param.span: 目前，此枚举中仅有的值是由用于设置主机应用程序域的 属性所指定的目录。

span.span: Currently the only value in this enumeration is the directory specified by the property that was used to set up the host's application domain.

param.name: addInFolderPaths
param.span: （可选）。

span.span: (Optional).

param.span: 包含一个或多个外接程序子目录的目录的路径。因为此参数接受字符串数组，所以可以指定多个路径。

span.span: The path of the directory that contains one or more subdirectories of add-ins. Because this parameter takes an array of strings, you can specify more than one path.

param.span: 如果外接程序位于管线目录结构中 AddIns 文件夹内，则不需要此参数。

span.span: This parameter is not required if your add-ins are located in the pipeline directory structure under the AddIns folder.

summary.span: 在由 值指定的位置和可选外接程序文件夹中查找外接程序的指定宿主视图的所有外接程序。

span.span: Finds all add-ins for a specified host view of the add-in at the location specified by a value and an optional add-ins folder.

returns.span: 表示已找到的外接程序的标记的集合。

span.span: A collection of tokens that represent the add-ins that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载可以启用部分受信任的主机，该主机可能没有发现其自身位置的路径发现权限，因此可以在其自己的目录中查找外接程序。Use this method overload to enable a partially trusted host, which may not have path discovery permission to discover its own location, to find add-ins in its own directory.

exception.span: 存在管线目录结构访问冲突。

summary.span: 从指定根目录中查找外接程序的指定宿主视图的所有外接程序。

returns.span: 表示已找到的外接程序的标记的集合。

span.span: A collection of tokens that represent the add-ins that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检查缓存外接程序和管线段信息的存储文件，以查找与指定`hostAddInView`类型匹配的所有外接程序。This method examines the store files of cached add-in and pipeline segment information to find all add-ins that match a specified `hostAddInView` type. 然后，你可以使用返回的集合中的某个令牌通过调用类的方法来激活特定外接程序。You can then use one of the tokens in the returned collection to activate a specific add-in by calling the method of the class.

exception.span: 存在管线目录结构访问冲突。

span.span: There is an access violation to the pipeline directory structure.

summary.span: 重新生成管线段缓存并包括新段。

span.span: Rebuilds the pipeline segments cache and includes new segments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果外接程序在管道目录结构之外，则调用此方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure. 如果未安装新的外接程序，则此方法只验证缓存。If no new add-ins are installed, this method just validates the cache.

exception.span: 管线目录结构中缺少段目录。

span.span: A segment directory is missing from the pipeline directory structure.

exception.span: 存在管线目录结构访问冲突。

span.span: There is an access violation to the pipeline directory structure.
